alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jackson and central Seminole Counties through 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/... At 520 PM EDT/420 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Chattahoochee, or 14 miles south of Donalsonville, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sneads, Grand Ridge, Seminole State Park, Desser, Reynoldsville, Blue Spring, Lovedale, Haynes, Drakes Still, Dellwood, Two Egg, Cypress, Fairchild, Buena Vista and Lake Seminole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
